import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const productId = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; //const product = useSelector((state) => console.log(state.product.products)); const product = useSelector((state) => state.product.products.find((product) => product._id === productId)); console.log(product) // console.log(productId) return (

Update product

{product.title}
id: {product._id}
in stock: {product.inStock}
